---
# =============================================================================
# posts.qmd - News and Blog Listing Page
# =============================================================================
# This page automatically lists all posts from the posts/ directory.
# Quarto's listing feature handles the display automatically.
#
# INSTRUCTIONS:
# 1. Create new posts in the posts/ folder as .qmd files
# 2. Name files with date prefix: YYYY-MM-DD-post-title.qmd
# 3. Each post needs a YAML header with title, date, and categories
# 4. The listing below will automatically update
#
# LISTING OPTIONS:
# - sort: How to order posts (date, title, etc.)
# - type: Display style (default, grid, table)
# - categories: Show category filters (true/false)
# - max-items: Number of posts to show (remove for all)
# - page-size: Number of posts per page if paginated
# =============================================================================
title: "News & Updates"
listing:
  contents: posts              # Directory containing posts
  sort: "date desc"            # Newest posts first
  type: default                # Display style: default, grid, or table
  categories: true             # Show category filters on sidebar
  sort-ui: false               # Hide sort controls
  filter-ui: false             # Hide filter controls
  # page-size: 10              # Uncomment to enable pagination
  # max-items: 5               # Uncomment to limit number shown
  fields: [date, title, description, categories]  # What to show for each post
---
